content:
Binder Class

In this Article

Contains factory methods to create dynamic call site binders for CSharp.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)]
public static class Binder

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • Binder

Methods

  • BinaryOperation(CSharpBinderFlags,ExpressionType,Type,IEnumerable<CSharpArgumentInfo>)

    Initializes a new CSharp binary operation binder.

    public static System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder BinaryOperation (Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags flags, System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType operation, Type context, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfo> argumentInfo);

    Parameters

    • flags
      CSharpBinderFlags

      The flags with which to initialize the binder.

    • operation
      ExpressionType

      The binary operation kind.

    • context
      Type

      The Type that indicates where this operation is used.

    • argumentInfo
      IEnumerable<CSharpArgumentInfo>

      The sequence of CSharpArgumentInfo instances for the arguments to this operation.

    Returns

    • CallSiteBinder

      Returns a new CSharp binary operation binder.

  • Convert(CSharpBinderFlags,Type,Type)

    Initializes a new CSharp convert binder.

    public static System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder Convert (Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpBinderFlags flags, Type type, Type context);

    Parameters

    • flags
      CSharpBinderFlags

      The flags with which to initialize the binder.

    • type
      Type

      The type to convert to.

    • context
      Type

      The Type that indicates where this operation is used.

    Returns

    • CallSiteBinder

      Returns a new CSharp convert binder.
